about.welcomeText: Hi There, Welcome to my portfolio, Je suis
description: I am an aspiring Data Scientist and Data Analyst who loves working with AI, ML and DL.
A unique blend of Technology, Economics, and AI & ML separates me from the rest, allowing me to provide technically backed financial insights and analysis.
Hands on Experience with Machine Learning and Deep Learning Projects.

services.title: Data Analysis
services.description: Expertise in Pandas, NumPy and NLP pipelines to extract value from complex datasets.

services.title: Data Visualization
services.description: Advanced plotting with Matplotlib, Seaborn, and PowerBI.

services.title: AI - ML
services.description: Scikit-learn, TensorFlow, and Deep Learning models.

services.title: Tools & Platforms
services.description: Git, Docker, SQL, MS-Excel, and Cloud Deployment.

education.institution: Université Marie et Louis Pasteur, Besançon
education.description: Economics blended with IT, focusing on Data Intelligence.

education.institution: Rungta College of Engineering and Technology, IN

description: Developed an automated data mining and monitoring pipeline in Pipedream, enabling real-time collection of social media data.
Engineered and optimized data pipelines by filtering, cleaning, and structuring over 28k Instagram Visibrain datasets.
Implemented LLM-based pipelines (ChatGPT API) for sentiment analysis, text extraction, and visual content interpretation.
Conducted the “Migration Project”, leveraging NLP and multimodal data analysis to study online narratives around immigration policy.
Integrated textual and visual embeddings to enhance sentiment and narrative detection.
Managed data workflows including cleaning, validation, preprocessing, modeling, and importing.
Performed SQL-based data extraction, updates, and database operations for efficient management.
Developed advanced Excel reporting tools, including pivot tables, queries, and macros.
Designed and maintained Power BI dashboards to support data-driven decision-making.
Implemented RPA tools (UiPath) to automate repetitive tasks and streamline operational processes.

certifications.title: Complete A.I. & Machine Learning Bootcamp
certifications.description: Comprehensive bootcamp covering Data Science stack.

certifications.title: Ethical Hacking & Counter Measures
certifications.description: Based on CEHv10, focusing on Cyber Security.

certifications.title: PHP Web Development
certifications.description: Full stack web development, with PHP, JS, CSS & MySQL.

projects.title: Impact of Scholarship in Academic Performance
description: What is the difference in academic performance between scholarship recipients and non-recipients?
Does receiving a scholarship influence student attendance?
How does attendance impact academic performance in the BDEEM Economics program?
How do the Matthew and Pygmalion Effects influence the academic success of scholarship recipients?

projects.title: Dynamics of Competition Policy
description: Does implementing the new model help us better track competition policy?
Comparison between the new model and the old model with a detailed analysis.
Identification of major factors affecting and shaping the policy.

projects.title: Bulldozer Price Prediction (ML)
description: Kaggle Competition on Bulldozer price prediction.
To predict the price with lowest possible RMSLE.
RMSLE achieved 0.24 (Ranked < 30 on Kaggle).

projects.title: Heart Disease Classification
description: Heart disease classification & prediction using binary models.
Feature importance analysis for health indicators.
Logistic regression model with hyperparameter tuning.

projects.title: Eurimobility SA Strategy Case
description: Develop strategy to reallocate dependency from Asian Suppliers.
Simulate Risks: Chip Shortage, Trade War, Logistics Crisis.
Used K-mean cluster to identify the risk suppliers.
Used Kraljic Matrix to identify new suppliers with Bargaining Power assessment.

github.notice: Notice: These repositories are fetched automatically using the GitHub API to demonstrate API integration skills.
